messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] slop, mud & sand
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/14/2002 11:35:09 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Saturday night entertainment? All orators sign up!!! kellyinsc [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/14/2002 11:35:09 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I'm thinking maybe a dramatic reading competition of a bunch of us reading
> that aloud, with volunteer kid judges would be a HOOT!
>
> I'm going to practice this part without taking a breath: -=- When a newbie
>
> starts mucking about
> and asking why 'slop, mud or sand' and not concrete, we throw bits of slop,
>
> mud and sand at them until they get the idea that they sometimes have to
> figure stuff out for themselves and sometimes just *doing* it will show
> them everything they ever wanted to know.-=-
>
>

Saturday night entertainment? All orators sign up!!!

kellyinsc
